name: Moneyboy Adventures
description:
We follow the journey in which our hero, Moneyboy, searches for higher financial levels. Tought he is brave, he will have to surpass the worse villain of all... bad programming. Take control of Moneyboy as he faces off against crashes with the help of your fellow followers.

Controls: 

WASD - Control the Moneyboy. 

Space Key - Shot.

Team
